biotools.summary: Database portal of glycan binding of human pathogen lectins and adhesins. Information is collected by experts from articles published in peer-reviewed scientific journals. The data were compiled through an exhaustive search of literature published over the past 30 years by glycobiologists, microbiologists, and medical histologists.
